title: Prohibited locations
fullText:
Wiring systems shall not be installed through any space formed between roofing or wall-lining material and its immediate supporting member (see Figure 3.6).
NOTE: Examples of these situations include those between tile battens and roofing tiles or between corrugated (or other profile) sheeting of a wall or roof and its supporting members. Examples are shown in Figures 3.6 and 3.7.
